    G

    GameController - Class in org.example.controller
    Controls the game logic, including game state updates, rendering, and user input.
    GameController(GameFrame, GamePanel) - Constructor for class org.example.controller.GameController
    Constructs a new GameController with the specified frame and panel.
    GameFrame - Class in org.example.view
    Represents the main game window frame.
    GameFrame() - Constructor for class org.example.view.GameFrame
    Constructs a new GameFrame, setting up the game panel and controller.
    GamePanel - Class in org.example.view
    Represents the panel where the game is rendered.
    GamePanel() - Constructor for class org.example.view.GamePanel
    Constructs a new GamePanel, setting up the status bar and loading the background image.
    GameRecord - Class in org.example.model
    Represents a highscore record for a player.
    GameRecord(int, String, int, int) - Constructor for class org.example.model.GameRecord
    Constructs a new GameRecord with the specified details.
    getAllScores() - Method in class org.example.model.HighscoreManager
    Retrieves all highscore records from the database, sorted by baskets collected and levels cleared.
    getBasketsCollected() - Method in class org.example.model.GameRecord
    Retrieves the number of baskets collected by the player.
    getBasketsCollected() - Method in class org.example.model.Player
    Gets the number of baskets collected by the player.
    getBounds() - Method in class org.example.model.Item
    Retrieves the bounding rectangle of the basket.
    getBounds() - Method in class org.example.model.Obstacle
    Retrieves the bounding rectangle of the obstacle.
    getBounds() - Method in class org.example.model.Player
    Gets the bounding rectangle representing the player's position and size.
    getBounds() - Method in class org.example.model.Ranger
    Retrieves the bounding rectangle of the ranger.
    getGamePanel() - Method in class org.example.view.GameFrame
    Retrieves the game panel associated with this frame.
    getLevelsCleared() - Method in class org.example.model.GameRecord
    Retrieves the number of levels cleared by the player.
    getPlayerId() - Method in class org.example.model.GameRecord
    Retrieves the player's unique identifier.
    getPlayerName() - Method in class org.example.model.GameRecord
    Retrieves the player's name.
    getPlayerName() - Method in class org.example.model.Score
    Retrieves the player's name.
    getScore() - Method in class org.example.model.Score
    Retrieves the player's score.
    getStatus() - Method in class org.example.controller.GameController
    Retrieves the current game status, including lives, baskets collected, and elapsed time.
